body.p: The solution includes an Administration Page where you can configure various options.

section.title: Signing in to the Administration Page

ol.li: Use the IP address shown in the VM console to access the web interface of . The address should be https://<server-address>:9080.By default, uses a self-signed certificate. If you did not change it, the browser will display a security warning. Continue (for example, if you are using Edge, click Details and then Go on to the webpage).
Log in with the credentials you configured in the initial setup.

p.note: For information about changing the password, see .

body.p: The Administration Page contains a variety of tabs with options in each.
